channel.title: How to get my PI client and server usable by others?
channel.description: I want to show this off to friends but its not at all like moparscape where you can choose you server and such, how will I solve this?

item.title: How to get my PI client and server usable by others?
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Well firstly you will have to portforward if you have not done so.
There are guides on how to just check on google
Or do portforward.com

If you have, then you will have to change your ip in your client and server for it connect.

Read full topic
